title: Elon Musk Says Teslaâ€™s Model S Plaid to Launch in China Next Year
sub_head: High-end sedan, priced starting around $130,000, should come to China probably around March, Tesla CEO says
body:
Tesla Inc . Chief Executive Elon Musk said the electric-vehicle company plans to launch its high-end sedan in China next year.
In a tweet early Monday, Mr. Musk said the Model S Plaid should come to China, probably around March.
